api_list.name: Finished matches
api_list.description: Get all information of finished matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basket-ball-livescore.p.rapidapi.com/v1/global/getbasketscorefinished"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basket-ball-livescore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
